message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
I think 55/45 is more reasonable, considering the inflation.
Bob, the inflation is hitting me harder. I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's be practical.
I understand inflation is hitting you harder, but I'm not willing to give up too much. 58/42 is my new proposal.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. The inflation is eating away at any potential gains, and this is the best I can do.
